meanings.sent1: Using a special solution, she transparentizes the glass to make it see-through.
meanings.sent2: The window cleaner transparentizes the glass, leaving it sparkling and clear.
meanings.sent3: He transparentizes the water so well, you can see all the way to the bottom!
meanings.sent4: Her smile transparentizes the room, brightening up everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The artist transparentizes the colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful, clear masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the ice transparentizes as it melts under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The fog slowly transparentizes, revealing the view of the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The mystery transparentizes as the detective unravels the clues.
meanings.sent4: His intentions transparentize as he speaks honestly about his feelings.
meanings.sent5: The truth transparentizes through her words, shining a light on the situation.
